title: Massive Installation size
body:
Yeah so I have played LoL back from 2012 but that doesn't really matter here...
I had quit the game for about 5 years and after returning I noticed that the Client had changed and I had to download a 1200mb file
I thought I was all set and ready to play but then I saw that there was no play button just a big L on the upper left corner with a 0%. I hovered my mouse over it and saw it was downloading something with the size of 14163  mb (14gb) do I really need to wait it out to play the game? Because   when I first played LoL I had to only download a 2gb file and the game was all set. Damn times have changed.

replies.body: League has come quite a long way since 2012! With the constant addition of new champions as well as changes to the jungle, there's also been quite a lot of new icons and wards. The overall size of League has grown rather substantially over the years! It might be a little bothersome depending on your download speeds, but you'll need to wait for that entire download before you can play.
